item.title: Arrows - #7 :)
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Okay i have this in my /RANGE/…

/*RANGE*/
public int arrowtype = 0;
public int rangebonus = 0;
public int addhit = 0;
public boolean HasArrows = false;

public void DeleteArrow()
{
 if(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] == 0)
 {
  deleteequiment(playerEquipment[playerArrows], playerArrows);
 }
 if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0){
  outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
  outStream.writeWord(1688);
  outStream.writeByte(playerArrows);
  outStream.writeWord(playerEquipment[playerArrows]+1);
  if (playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1 > 254) {
   outStream.writeByte(255);
   outStream.writeDWord(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1);
  }
  else {
   outStream.writeByte(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1); //amount	
  }
  outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
  playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -= 1;
 }  
  updateRequired = true; 
  appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public void CheckArrowtype() //Owned
{
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882){
arrowtype = 1; // bronze
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884){
arrowtype = 2; // iron
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886){
arrowtype = 3; // steel
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888){
arrowtype = 4; // mith
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890){
arrowtype = 5; // addy
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892){
arrowtype = 6; // rune
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 598 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 942 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2533 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2535 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2537 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2539 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2541){
arrowtype = 7; // Fire arrows
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 78){
arrowtype = 8; // Ice arrows
}
}
public void CheckArrows()
{
   for(int k = 880; k < 893; k++){

   if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == k){
   HasArrows = true; 
  }
   else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4160 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 598 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 942 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2533 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2535 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2537 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2539 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 2541 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 78){
  HasArrows = true;
  }
  else {
   HasArrows = false;
  }

 }
}

In my attack method, i added

} else if(UseBow){
if(!HasArrows){ 
sendMessage("There's no arrows left in your quiver");
ResetAttack();
}
else if(HasArrows){

And when i shoot arrows, it still doesn’t require arrows to shoot.

My question: How and/or what do i add, to make it shoot arrows… When arrows are equipped… Because atm, they still shoot even with no arrows in inventory, or equipped…

Appreciated. Thnx
